body: well you just said it yourself, they are broken character, a normal human have no way to bang them without some cheat item/power

I know porn isn't the first place to find a half-decent plot, but goddamn why does every single Touhou doujin rely on "lol we have a super drug that perfecrly nullifies the powers of broken characters and also makes them ultra horny".

Also, needs more yuri.
